    Title: Paisley Sculpture 1
    Date: 2018-06-27T21:47:46
    Tags: wood, woodworking, relief, sculpture, art

A new piece - a paisley sculpture carved in relief out of maple and mahogany.

The mahogany pedestal features rosettes and small chip-carved patterns incorporating
incisions. The paisley piece rests in a bed of felt.
